channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bollard (in flower bed) has been removed., 15th January
item.description:
This bollard was knocked over by a van several months ago. It looks as though it needs to be secured back into the ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: The thousands of Styrofoam Balls are NOT Resolved, 15th January
item.description:
Despite indicating the styrofoam balls have been collected, they have not been touched. It is not resolved. This litter is all over the street. There needs to be a cleaning crew dispatched to take care of what the streets work crew left behind.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevet Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Damaged/sunken pavement outside 57 Green Lane, 15th January
item.description:
The pavement dips down and results in a large puddle whenever there is rain. This is particularly dangerous when it gets icy. This has been a problem for some time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building debris on road, 15th January
item.description:
Road covered in large rocks, if hit by a car will not only damage cars but passers by. Children are often walking to and from school along here. Looks like building rubble and material from little Birches

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Rotting leaves need to be removed - Westdale Rd & Ranwell Passage, 15th January
item.description:
The trees on Westdale Road have no more leaves to drop, so please can all the rotting leaves be cleared from Westdale Road's pavement and gutter, the back of Westdale Road's carpark and Ranwell Passage.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westdale Road, Woolwich
